name: GameKeyMove
description:
Like Game Moveing, you control page using only left hand on keyboard. USAGE: [W][S]key to scroll up/down , move history: [A][D]key, move tab: [Q][E] key, zoomIn/Out:[1][2], reload:[R], duplicate tab[B], create new tab [N], close tab[C]. And [ESC] or tool bar button toggle this mode on/off. Initial state is off. and also this state sync browser & each tab page equal with a little lag. This addon don't work at TextArea and Input as far. Of cource, at addon or new tab page neither.
